p: The testosterone propionate (TP) used for the induction of BPH was purchased from Sigma-Aldrich chemical company, Germany. The enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay test kit used for PSA determination was a product of Elabscience Biotechnology, Inc. Houston, Texas, United State. Avodart TM (Dutasteride) was manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals S.A., 189 Grunwaldzka Str, 60â€“322 Poznan, Poland. Reagents used for the assays were commercial test kits purchased from Randox Laboratories Ltd., Crumlin, Antrim, UK. Thiobarbituric acid (TBA) was purchased from HiMedia Laboratories Pvt. Ltd, Mumbai, India. All other chemicals and reagents used for this study were of analytical grade.
